articles.title: Argentina Stun 6-time Champions Germany to Win Second Junior Hockey World Cup Title
articles.description: Lautaro Domene scored a hat-trick as Argentina beat Germany 4-2 to win their second FIH Junior Men's Hockey World Cup title.
articles.content: Lautaro Domene struck a hat-trick as a determined Argentina stunned six-time champions Germany 4-2 to clinch their second FIH Junior Men’s Hockey World Cup title at the Kalinga Stadium here on Sunday. Domene converted three penalty corners in the 10t... [1519 chars]

articles.title: Men's Junior Hockey World Cup 2021: Lautaro Domene's hat-trick helps Argentina stun Germany, clinch 2nd title
articles.description: Domene converted three penalty corners in the 10th, 25th and 50th minute, while Franco Agoistini (60th) scored a field goal just seconds from the final hooter to hand Argentina their second title.
articles.content:
Domene converted three penalty corners in the 10th, 25th and 50th minute, while Franco Agoistini (60th) scored a field goal just seconds from the final hooter to hand Argentina their second title.

articles.title: Florida man stabbed co-worker who refused to date him
articles.description: Agustin Lucas Mariani, 20, faces second-degree murder charges for the fatal stabbing of Delfina Pan, a 28-year-old from Argentina who had refused to date him.
articles.content:
A Miami Beach man whose repeated romantic advances to a restaurant co-worker were rejected killed her outside her apartment, according to reports.

articles.title: Odisha CM Naveen Patnaik lauds successful completion of Hockey Junior WC in Bhubaneswar
articles.description: Curtains came down on another fantastic hockey event in Bhubaneswar when the FIH Odisha Hockey men's Junior World Cup 2021 ended on Sunday with Argentina lifting the title at the iconic Kalinga Hockey Stadium.
